metadata.description:
Original Game Sound Composed by
Yuka Tsujiyoko / INTELLIGENT SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.
Programed & Sound Effects by
Kenichi Nishimaki / INTELLIGENT SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.

Taishi Senda / INTELLIGENT SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.

Editing & Directed by Kohshyoh Ohtake
Music Performed & Sequenced by "vAin"

Product Management by
Tomomi Takemura / OHTAKE LTD.
Digital Mastered by Wataru Ishii / ONKIO HAUS

Art Direction & Design by
Syuuichi Ohki / ENTERBRAIN,INC.

Special Thanks to
Masanobu Matsunaga / INTELLIGENT SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.
Takanao Kondo / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.
Mitsuaki Hagishima / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.

Thanks to
Yoshinobu Imamura (FAMITSU P.P.)

Produced by
Sachio Masugata (FAMITSU Sound) /
ENTERBRAIN,INC.
